info.name: DOM EventListener - Cross-Site Scripting
author: yavolo
dwisiswant0
info.description: EventListener contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability via the document object model (DOM). An attacker can execute arbitrary script which can then allow theft of cookie-based authentication credentials and launch of  other attacks.

info.name: Cookies without HttpOnly attribute - Detect
author: princechaddha
mr.bobo hp
info.description: Checks whether cookies in the HTTP response contain the HttpOnly attribute. If the HttpOnly flag is set, it means that the cookie is HTTP-only
info.impact: Lack of HttpOnly flag on cookies increases the risk of client-side attacks, compromising user session security and data privacy.
info.remediation: Ensure that all cookies are set with the HttpOnly attribute to prevent client-side access.

All the information about accessibility of public places

  • Search for a facility
  • Add a facility

Our mission

In France, 12 millions of people, one person in five, is or will be disabled during his or her life.

Going out, going to a new place can become a real headache. Having information before traveling is essential to allow everyone to know if a restaurant or a cinema is accessible to them.

⬇

Whether you are disabled, a relative, friend or carer, consult accessibility information quickly and easily!

See the latest referenced places

Information displayed on major websites

Based on the principle of "tell us once", the information collected on acceslibre is automatically and instantly displayed on our partners' sites.

It is your turn !

Contributors,

During an outing, everyone can contribute!

Add a location or complete an existing profile, every piece of information is valuable.

Add a facility

Local authorities

Accessibility drivers in your territories, take advantage of acceslibre to:

  • collect and improve information on public places
  • have a better vision of the real accessibility of your businesses,
  • enhance your territory by increasing visibility on the web
Get in touch with us

Are you getting involved in collecting accessibility data for roads and transport?

Learn more about acceslibre mobility

Facility managers

Thanks to acceslibre, increase your visibility on the internet

Highlight the services you offer to welcome all your customers

Completing your establishment's information will only take a few minutes.

Add your facility

Websites, web platforms

All accessibility data collected by acceslibre is free and open source. It is available to you via our API or our dataset updated daily (links at the bottom of the page).

Make your site more inclusive and richer by integrating our information, thanks to our widget.

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: acceslibre.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 403 Forbidden Connection: close Transfer-Encoding: chunked Content-Language: fr Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self' data: *.mapbox.com *.gouv.fr *.incubateur.net acceslibre.matomo.cloud *.tile.openstreetmap.org *.acceslibre.info *.posthog.com Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy: same-origin Date: Sun, 22 Dec 2024 01:38:16 GMT Referrer-Policy: same-origin Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000 Vary: origin, Accept-Language X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: DENY X-Request-Id: f3b98c5e-b948-418d-9f0e-f31a02cd9ab3 403 Forbidden

Interdit (403)

La vérification CSRF a échoué. La requête a été interrompue.

Vous voyez ce message parce que ce site HTTPS exige que le navigateur web envoie un en-tête « Referer », ce qu’il n'a pas fait. Cet en-tête est exigé pour des raisons de sécurité, afin de s’assurer que le navigateur n’ait pas été piraté par un intervenant externe.

Si vous avez désactivé l’envoi des en-têtes « Referer » par votre navigateur, veuillez les réactiver, au moins pour ce site ou pour les connexions HTTPS, ou encore pour les requêtes de même origine (« same-origin »).

Si vous utilisez la balise <meta name="referrer" content="no-referrer"> ou que vous incluez l’en-tête « Referrer-Policy: no-referrer », il est préférable de les enlever. La protection CSRF exige que l’en-tête ``Referer`` effectue un contrôle de référant strict. Si vous vous souciez de la confidentialité, utilisez des alternatives comme <a rel="noreferrer" …> pour les liens vers des sites tiers.

Des informations plus détaillées sont affichées lorsque la variable DEBUG vaut True.
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: acceslibre.beta.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://acceslibre.beta.gouv.fr/'

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.
